amendment.description: To add a deficit-neutral reserve fund for the protection and safety of the Nation's food supply.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4352 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4352 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Casey. (consideration: S2064-2067; text: CR S2067) To add a deficit-neutral reserve fund for the protection and safety of the Nation's food supply.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4352 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4352 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Casey.
